success_story_items.title: Plaza Low Yat, Malaysia
success_story_items.subtitle: Smart retail system powered by Jovision AI cameras.
success_story_items.description: Jovision Deepcloud smart retailing system and face capture Camera (Model: JVS-FR3022) have been deployed successfully in Plaza Low Yat — the most famous IT mall in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. The solution enables human flow analytics, age and gender recognition, and intelligent marketing insights.

success_story_items.title: Smart Kitchen Solution – Paris Baguette, Malaysia
success_story_items.subtitle: AI-based monitoring for kitchen hygiene and safety.
success_story_items.description: Jovision Smart Kitchen Solution monitors staff behavior and hygiene compliance in real time, detecting chef uniform status, mask wearing, garbage conditions, and smoking violations — ensuring food safety and consistent brand image for Paris Baguette branches in Malaysia.

success_story_items.title: Panchdona Sir K.G Gupta High School, Bangladesh
success_story_items.subtitle: Smart surveillance ensuring safety in education environments.
success_story_items.description: Jovision 3MP and 5MP Full-Color IP Cameras with 32ch NVRs are installed at Panchdona Sir K.G Gupta High School, Bangladesh — enhancing the safety of students and staff through high-definition monitoring and sound recording.

success_story_items.title: Suvarnabhumi Airport, Thailand
success_story_items.subtitle: AI-powered monitoring for aviation infrastructure.
success_story_items.description: Jovision PTZ and Starlight IP cameras are installed throughout Suvarnabhumi Airport to strengthen airport security systems and support the country’s move toward smarter, more secure international transportation.

success_story_items.title: Kogi State Project, Nigeria
success_story_items.subtitle: Centralized smart monitoring for government infrastructure.
success_story_items.description: Jovision 9ch Decoder (Model: JVS-D6016-9HD) and VMS-6100 software were deployed for the Kogi State Government in Nigeria, enabling intelligent decoding, real-time monitoring, and improved video wall management.

success_story_items.title: Əli-94 Super Market, Azerbaijan
success_story_items.subtitle: Complete surveillance overhaul for large retail area.
success_story_items.description: Over 100 Jovision PoE Starlight IP Cameras and 32ch NVRs replaced the old analog system across a 10,000 sqm retail space — delivering clearer, smarter, and more reliable video coverage for ‘Əli-94’ Super Market, Azerbaijan.

success_story_items.title: Colosseum, Italy
success_story_items.subtitle: Advanced access control and health monitoring integration.
success_story_items.description: Jovision 4-in-1 Access Control System (facial recognition, temperature, mask detection) and VMS-6100 platform were installed in the Colosseum, Italy to enhance visitor management and public safety.

success_story_items.title: KEB Bank, Korea
success_story_items.subtitle: AI-based access control for secure banking operations.
success_story_items.description: Jovision JVS-FRT-P8 and VMS-6100 systems are used at KEB Bank in Korea to support smart access control, risk management, and secure branch entry — enhancing both safety and efficiency.

success_story_items.title: Plaza Low Yat, Malaysia
success_story_items.subtitle: Sistem ritel pintar dengan kamera AI Jovision.
success_story_items.description: Sistem ritel pintar Deepcloud dan kamera pengenal wajah Jovision (Model: JVS-FR3022) berhasil diterapkan di Plaza Low Yat — pusat IT paling terkenal di Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Solusi ini memungkinkan analisis lalu lintas pengunjung, pengenalan usia dan gender, serta wawasan pemasaran cerdas.

success_story_items.title: Solusi Dapur Pintar – Paris Baguette, Malaysia
success_story_items.subtitle: Pemantauan kebersihan dapur berbasis AI.
success_story_items.description: Solusi Dapur Pintar Jovision digunakan untuk memantau perilaku staf dan kepatuhan higienitas secara real-time, termasuk pakaian koki, masker, kondisi tempat sampah, dan larangan merokok — memastikan keamanan pangan dan citra merek Paris Baguette di Malaysia.

success_story_items.title: Sekolah Panchdona Sir K.G Gupta, Bangladesh
success_story_items.subtitle: Sistem pengawasan pintar untuk keamanan pendidikan.
success_story_items.description: Kamera IP Jovision 3MP dan 5MP Full-Color serta NVR 32ch diterapkan di Sekolah Panchdona Sir K.G Gupta, Bangladesh untuk meningkatkan keamanan siswa dan staf dengan rekaman berkualitas tinggi.

success_story_items.title: Bandara Suvarnabhumi, Thailand
success_story_items.subtitle: Pemantauan cerdas berbasis AI untuk infrastruktur penerbangan.
success_story_items.description: Kamera PTZ dan Starlight IP Jovision diterapkan di seluruh Bandara Suvarnabhumi, Thailand untuk memperkuat sistem keamanan dan mendukung langkah menuju transportasi internasional yang lebih aman dan efisien.

success_story_items.title: Proyek Negara Bagian Kogi, Nigeria
success_story_items.subtitle: Pemantauan terpusat untuk infrastruktur pemerintahan.
success_story_items.description: Decoder Jovision 9ch (Model: JVS-D6016-9HD) bersama perangkat lunak VMS-6100 digunakan untuk mendukung Pemerintah Negara Bagian Kogi, Nigeria dalam pengelolaan video wall dan pemantauan real-time yang cerdas.

success_story_items.title: Əli-94 Super Market, Azerbaijan
success_story_items.subtitle: Pembaruan total sistem pengawasan di area ritel besar.
success_story_items.description: Lebih dari 100 Kamera IP PoE Starlight Jovision dan NVR 32ch menggantikan sistem analog lama di area ritel seluas 10.000 m² — memberikan pengawasan yang lebih jernih, cerdas, dan andal di ‘Əli-94’ Super Market, Azerbaijan.

success_story_items.title: Colosseum, Italia
success_story_items.subtitle: Integrasi kontrol akses dan pemantauan kesehatan canggih.
success_story_items.description: Sistem Kontrol Akses 4-in-1 Jovision (pengenalan wajah, suhu, deteksi masker) serta platform VMS-6100 diterapkan di Colosseum, Italia untuk meningkatkan manajemen pengunjung dan keamanan publik.

success_story_items.title: KEB Bank, Korea
success_story_items.subtitle: Kontrol akses berbasis AI untuk keamanan perbankan.
success_story_items.description: Sistem JVS-FRT-P8 dan VMS-6100 Jovision digunakan di KEB Bank, Korea untuk mendukung kontrol akses cerdas, manajemen risiko, dan keamanan kantor cabang secara efisien.
